title: Service-Learning-Based Language Education Design: Enhancing Competencies through Uncertainty and Social Connectedness

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and professional experience in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Integrating professional learners’ language competencies with social problem-solving in an asynchronous learning environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose real language-related problems of local community organizations and design solutions through service-learning projects
Learners can develop and apply language strategies through collaborative communication in uncertain problem situations.
Learners can utilize language skills in authentic contexts through continuous interaction with social institutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
